pipeline.name: Input
pipeline.description: Data collection from brand properties, competitors, and market signals

pipeline.name: Context Building
pipeline.description: Semantic analysis and knowledge graph construction

pipeline.name: Module Analysis
pipeline.description: Parallel execution of specialized audit modules

modules.name: AI Visibility
modules.shortDescription: Track brand presence in AI responses
modules.fullDescription: Monitors how your brand appears in responses from ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and other major AI platforms. Tracks mention frequency, positioning, and sentiment.

modules.name: Trust & Authority
modules.fullDescription: Analyzes how AI models cite your brand, validates factual accuracy, and measures authority signals across the AI ecosystem.

modules.name: Content Quality
modules.fullDescription: Evaluates your content's structure, semantic richness, and AI-readability to improve how AI models understand and represent your brand.

modules.name: Technical SEO
modules.fullDescription: Audits technical aspects that affect how AI crawlers access and understand your content, including structured data and performance.

modules.name: Competitive Intelligence
modules.fullDescription: Monitors competitor visibility, share of voice, and positioning in AI responses to identify opportunities and threats.
